overview: Prof Barbara Demeneix heads the internationally recognized academic laboratory (UMR CNRS 5166/Museum National d’Histoire Naturelle) from which derives WatchFrog’s versatile technology (patent exclusively licensed to the company). The main area of expertise of Barbara Demeneix is molecular physiology and endocrinology. Her team is renowned for having developed a number of non-viral somatic gene transfer methods for following transcriptional regulations in vivo and for applying germinal transgenesis with fluorescent proteins in Xenopus. She has a total of 79 original papers, over 20 book chapters and 4 patents. She also has wide management experience and is the coordinator of NoE “CRESCENDO”.

relationships.title: Co-founder and chairman of the Scientific Council
